text:
Mr. Edward A. Altschuler
November 17, 1965
Page #2
serves as a "status symbol", in that not only our members
but outsiders as well tend to think more favorable of industrial
concerns who evince their interest in educational broadcasting
in this "practical" way.
I realize that you may have questions, and I will be happy
to answer them, but I did want to inform you as to possible
methods of affiliation and to send you some samples of our
materials.
Sincerely,
Harold E. Hill
HEHssc
